  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211781</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pyrotechnically Speaking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pyrotechnically Sprechen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parler de Pyrotechnically</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discurso De Pyrotechnically</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parlare Di Pyrotechnically</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομιλία Pyrotechnically</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Discurso De Pyrotechnically</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Meet chemistry professor Dr. John Conkling in this interview from the NOVA Web site and learn why fireworks are his passion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Treffen Sie Chemieprofessor Dr. John Conkling in 
diesem Interview von der NOVA Web site und erlernen Sie, warum 
Feuerwerke seine Neigung sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rencontrez le professeur Dr. John Conkling de 
chimie dans cette entrevue du site de Web de NOVA et apprenez 
pourquoi les feux d'artifice sont sa passion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre-se com o professor Dr. John Conkling do 
chemistry nesta entrevista do Web site do NOVA e aprenda-se porque os 
fireworks são sua paixão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Venga a contatto del professor il Dott. John 
Conkling di chimica in questa intervista dal Web site del NOVA ed 
impari perchè i fireworks sono la sua passione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συναντήστε τον καθηγητή χημείας ο Δρ John 
Conkling σε αυτήν την συνέντευξη από τον ιστοχώρο NOVA και 
μάθετε γιατί τα πυροτεχνήματα είναι το πάθος του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Satisfaga a profesor el Dr. Juan Conkling de la 
química en esta entrevista del sitio del Web de la NOVA y 
aprenda porqué los fuegos artificiales son su pasión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
